title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Duo Chromatic Illuminating Powder, Crushed Bloom

description: Light up your features with our new Duo Chromatic Illuminating Powder. Available in five glowing shades, this silky Powder blends like a dream for a fresh-faced look. This breathtaking formula's light-catching pearls deliver a luminous finish that looks different from every angle. Brush this illuminating wonder along the highest points of the face-such as the cheekbones, bridge of the nose and Cupid's bow.
